thread.title: Steve Brody

author: Steve Brody
title: Steve Brody
text:
I always loved when my grandfather would come to visit. He would take me downtown to the department store confection store. He would buy these lack licorice coins that he and I would share.
I was thinkin about my grandfather, and decided to look online for this favorite treat we shared.
I found the same exact black licorice coins on CandyWarehouse.com.
I am a dedicated customer from now on!
